radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild 6.4 mm dilation of the distal colon. Multiple air-fluid levels are seen on upright view. Paucity of air within the small bowel. No free intraperitoneal air. Osseous structures are unremarkable. Post laparotomy midline skin staples are aligned and intact. Tip of the NG tube is visualized within the body of the stomach.
